org.mcm.sws
Class ExecEnvironment

java.lang.Object
  org.mcm.sws.ExecEnvironment
public class ExecEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object

The ExecEnvironment contains the agent's FACT BASE.

Author:
Joachim Peer
